scripts.auto-debug-e2etest: npm run build && npm run debug-e2etest --
scripts.auto-debug-interactionstest: npm run build && npm run debug-interactionstest --
scripts.auto-e2etest: npm run test -- --warn auto-e2etest && vpython3 third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_test_suite.js --config=test/e2e/test-runner-config.json --autoninja
scripts.auto-e2etest-rdb: npm run test -- --warn auto-e2etest-rdb && rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-e2etest --
scripts.auto-e2etest-parallel: npm run build && npm run e2etest-parallel --
scripts.auto-e2etest-parallel-rdb: npm run test -- --warn auto-e2etest-parallel-rdb && rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-e2etest-parallel --
scripts.auto-interactionstest: npm run build && npm run interactionstest --
scripts.auto-interactionstest-rdb: npm run test -- --warn auto-interactionstest-rdb && rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-interactionstest --
scripts.auto-screenshotstest: npm run test -- --warn auto-screenshotstest && npm run build && third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_test_suite.js --config test/interactions/test-runner-config.json --mocha-fgrep '[screenshot]'
scripts.auto-screenshotstest-rdb: npm run test -- --warn auto-screenshotstest-rdb && rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-screenshotstest --
scripts.auto-unittest: npm run test -- --warn auto-unittest && vpython3 scripts/test/run_auto_unittests.py --no-text-coverage
scripts.auto-unittest-rdb: npm run test -- --warn auto-unittest-rdb && rdb stream -new -realm chromium:public -- npm run auto-unittest --
scripts.auto-unittest-coverage: npm run test -- --warn auto-unittest-coverage && vpython3 scripts/test/run_auto_unittests.py --no-text-coverage --coverage
scripts.bake-strings: npm run collect-strings && vpython3 third_party/node/node.py --output third_party/i18n/bake-strings.js front_end/core/i18n/locales
scripts.check: npm run check-lint && npm run check-loc
scripts.check-lint: vpython3 third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_lint_check_js.mjs && vpython3 third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_lint_check_css.js
scripts.e2etest: npm run test -- --warn e2etest && vpython3 third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_test_suite.js --config=test/e2e/test-runner-config.json
scripts.e2etest-parallel: npm run test -- --warn e2etest-parallel && vpython3 scripts/test/run_test_suite_parallel.py
scripts.interactionstest: npm run test -- --warn interactionstest && vpython3 third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_test_suite.js --config=test/interactions/test-runner-config.json
scripts.perf: npm run test -- --warn perf && vpython3 third_party/node/node.py --output scripts/test/run_test_suite.js --config=test/perf/test-runner-config.json
scripts.start: node -e 'console.log(`This script has been removed in favor of --custom-devtools-frontend. For more information, see https://docs.google.com/document/d/1COgCBWWuTh2o-Zbp6h_z0h0LtlJaimaEDsION4RZPxc/edit?usp=sharing`);'
scripts.unittest: npm run test -- --warn unittest && vpython3 scripts/test/run_unittests.py --no-text-coverage
scripts.watch-unittest: npm run test -- --warn watch-unittest && vpython3 scripts/test/run_unittests.py --no-text-coverage --karma-args='--auto-watch --no-single-run --restart-on-file-change --auto-watch-batch-delay 250'
